entry.tran: (某组织定期发送的)内部通讯，简报
entry.def: A newsletter is one or more printed sheets of paper containing information about an organization that is sent regularly to its members.

example.ex: The organization now has around 18,000 members who receive a quarterly newsletter.
example.tran: 该组织现有大约18,000名成员，他们会收到一份内部通讯季刊。

means.word_mean: 1. report or open letter giving informal or confidential news of interest to a special group

auth_sentence.content: This newsletter will usually be sent once a day.
auth_sentence.res_content: This newsletter will usually be sent once a day.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This newsletter will usually be sent once a day.

auth_sentence.content: This newsletter will usually be sent once a week.
auth_sentence.res_content: This newsletter will usually be sent once a week.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This newsletter will usually be sent once a week.

auth_sentence.content: This newsletter will usually be sent once a month.
auth_sentence.res_content: This newsletter will usually be sent once a month.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This newsletter will usually be sent once a month.
